embed.description: I just played her and after ~ 30/35 min I couldn't use Q, R and B anymore.. i even tried to bind it on another Key.. + i wrote it in chat (so ye,...

replies.body:
I got the same bug in a recent game... wasnt that funny to just sit around and can't do shit till it works again.
The bug appered after ~10 minutes and lastet for like 20 minutes. after that it suddenly worked normal.

Please fix it soon Riot
das selbe gehabt, nach einem suicide im eigenem jungle (naja, eher baron, war schneller), gingen die skills wieder
